name: Game Jam Homicide
description:
A local multiplayer game where players take turns playing the murderer and the detective.
Look through openable cabinets and closets to find items. The murderer has to kill the victim, hide the body and the murder weapon, and place traps. 

The detective has to find the body and murder weapon and put them in evidence boxes. Get out of the door before the timer goes off, otherwise, you lose. 

Collect money to increase your playtime. Use the mop to clean the blood.
